sentences.english: Steven Speilberg was part of the original creative team thatdesigned Islands of Adventure.
sentences.chinese: 斯皮爾伯格是這個冒險公園的最初設計者之一。

sentences.english: Spielberg took the rejected 9)script to Sheinberg.
sentences.chinese: 於是斯皮爾伯格把被拒絕的劇本交給薛因伯格。

sentences.english: Babi Yar is a ravine just outside Kiev which is the capital of Ukraine.
sentences.chinese: 斯皮爾伯格是一個深谷基輔郊外的是烏克蘭首都。

sentences.english: 423:Spielberg has made two films about creatures that come to the earth from outer space.
sentences.chinese: 斯皮爾伯格已拍了兩部外星球生物來地球的電影。
